item.description:
Let's meet at the Bostonville Grill for the thirteenth regular season game. In week 10, the Bears showed up on both sides of the field, for once. Hopefully the Bears continue playing well against the Jaguars, so come on out and cheer on your Bears!

I know this location is NOT T accessible so for those who need a ride for a T station please indicate in the RSVP that you need a ride and we will make arrangements for carpools from a T stop so that you can watch the game with the group.


For details on Bostonville Grill visit there web site at http://www.bostonvill...


Directions:

We are located on the northbound side of Rt1 in Lynnfield.
If you are coming south on Rt1 from the Danvers area, you will have to turn around and head back north at the Walnut Steet Exit (take Walnut Street exit towards Lynn).
Heading northbound on Rt1 beyond the Walnut Street exit, we are located before the next Rt1 exit.
While heading north on Rt1 you will pass Polcari's, Dunkin Donuts, the Naked Fish and then you will be very close.
Our driveway is just beyond the Kelly Nissan dealership.
Print out the map or there web site or use the "driving directions" link for further help.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign,

group.name: Chicago Sports Club of New England

item.name: Week 14 Football: Bears vs Jaguars
